content: simple crochet autumn bell flower bookmark this is the season of crocheting crochet flowers and leaves crochet flowers and crochet leaf motifs have always been very popular choice of crafters they are the most quick working project and they are just very versatile to be included into larger crochet projects there is nothing more fun than crocheting your own holiday theme projects today am sharing the pattern for simple crochet autumn bell flower bookmark crocheted bookmarks crochet bookmarks are quick and fun projects to make on the go you can easily whip up a bookmark in just few minutes this would make great decor and gift giving project you can make a couple of them to sell at holiday themed craft fairs the pattern is very easy and beginner friendly the bell flower is made with puff stitches its also a great stash bursting project materials used - 4 ply cotton knitting yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 10 inches- customizable to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/y1bhbtnykdy
